data: Just wanted to let you know we received a call from our friend Ed last night.  Ed wanted us to know he is so happy with Alan & his services.  Ed could not say enough about how helpful Alan was, he was so pleased.  Thanks so much.
Please let Alan know we all now have his number and we are passing it around.  We will be calling him with any future computer needs and will tell our friends & family.  Thanks again.

I needed a computer that would run Pro-Tools for my home studio and be a workstation for my artwork. Zinsky's PC Configurations really came through for me. I have two power-full computers put into one. I would recommend Zinsky's PC Configurations to anyone that needs computer work.
